full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/21/2023 UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE Immigration and Naturalization Service FILE NUMBER A21 201 153 Ke Due Pham DATE 1-25-79 Please come to the office shown below at the time and place indicated in connection with an official matter. OFFICE LOCATION Room No. Floor No. DATE AND HOUR Wednesday, March 28, 1979 at 2:00 ASK FOR REASON FOR APPOINTMENT Adjustment 7 Status BRING WITH YOU Form 1-94 IT IS IMPORTANT THAT YOU KEEP THIS APPOINTMENT AND BRING THIS LETTER WITH YOU. If you are unable to do so, state your reason, sign below and return this letter to this office at once. I am unable to keep the appointment because: Very truly yours, SIGNATURE DATE Form G-56 (Rev. 5-1-73) N CHECK THIS BOX WHEN COPY MAILED TO ATTORNEY OR REPRESENTATIVE FILE COPY
